comments.comments_text: Chelsea have a chance to score from a corner kick, but the ball is cleared by a defender.

comments.comments_text: Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Hakim Ziyech (Chelsea). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out. The ball goes out of play and Chelsea have been awarded a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) was quite harsh and Srdjan Jovanovic didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Clinical finish! Reece James (Chelsea) finds himself some space inside the box to control a rebound and fires the ball into the left side of the goal, giving the goalkeeper no chance.

comments.comments_text: A superb goal from great team play! Timo Werner (Chelsea) latches on to a perfect pass and fires an excellent low shot into the middle of the net. There is nothing a goalkeeper can do about shots like that.
